About Me

I have spent years working at an overnight summer camp in leadership positions where I learned how to lead and the values of both good teamwork and communication. In the past, my creative thinking has led to unexpected and alternate solutions to outstanding problems, which in turn inspired my supervisors to rethink the company's approach to problem solving.

Computer programming has always been one of my favorite pastimes, and a passion to learn and grow has driven me to finally take the leap and turn that hobby into a career. My ability to adapt and improvise has always made the most daunting of tasks seem surmountable and has perfectly translated into my journey as a software engineer.

Projects

Tetris Funk

I created a personal variation of the classic game Tetris (named Tetris Funk). It required extensive logical thinking and was achieved in JavaScript using recursive loops. JavaScript was used for DOM manipulation, and CSS for the visual design.

Movie Guru

A global search index for big budget and independent films.Created a filtering system that could search a specific APIwith a modular endpoint depending on the user’s needs.

Rmbr Assistant

A full stack website hosting a smart calendar assistant. The backend was written in Python, and our API uses SQLAlchemy & Marshmallow for the database. The app links to the user’s Google account using OAuth2.0 and accesses the user’s calendar.

Find-A-Pint

A Pub index full stack website, with Geolocation, full map integration and extensive authentication. The database wascreated using MongoDB, Mongoose and ExpressJS.
